name: Punjabi Hindi Translator
description: This free application is able to translate words and text from Punjabi to Hindi, and from Hindi to Punjabi. Best application for easy and fast translation, which can be used like a dictionary. If you are a student, tourist or traveler, it will helps you to learn the language! This application contain the following features: - Translate words and sentences - Translate from clipboard - Simple and user-friendly interface - Voice input Free translator from Punjabi to Hindi, and from Hindi to Punjabi.
